.. _wx.lib.mixins.inspection.InspectableApp:

==========================================================================================================================================
|phoenix_title|  **wx.lib.mixins.inspection.InspectableApp**
==========================================================================================================================================

A simple mix of :class:`App` and :class:`InspectionMixin` that can be used
stand-alone.



|
